attributes.contentHtml:
Puggo That picture is just showing how unprofessional can be. That's enough to just demonstrate that the tags of the thread are properly used.

What about you, don't you have to scam some people with your summerhoaxing? I mean, you aren't even able to get yourself a logo. You literally just stole a stock image from google and put a text with the name and used a trash font.
